about: Dataset schema for US Dept. of Education

dataset_fields.label: Description
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Human-readable description (e.g., an abstract) with sufficient detail to enable a user to quickly understand whether the asset is of interest.

dataset_fields.label: Tags
dataset_fields.help_text: Tags (or keywords) help users discover your dataset; please include terms that would be used by technical and non-technical users.

dataset_fields.label: Office
dataset_fields.help_text: The publishing entity and optionally their parent organization(s).

dataset_fields.label: Contact Name
dataset_fields.help_text: Contact person’s name for the asset.

dataset_fields.label: Contact Email
dataset_fields.help_text: Contact person’s email for the asset.

dataset_fields.label: Public Access Level
dataset_fields.help_text: The degree to which this dataset could be made publicly-available, regardless of whether it has been made available. Choices: public (Data asset is or could be made publicly available to all without restrictions), restricted public (Data asset is available under certain use restrictions), or non-public (Data asset is not available to members of the public).

dataset_fields.label: Unique Identifier
dataset_fields.help_text: A unique identifier for the dataset or API as maintained within an Agency catalog or database.

dataset_fields.label: Bureau Code
dataset_fields.help_text: Federal agencies, combined agency and bureau code from OMB Circular A-11, Appendix C (PDF, CSV) in the format of 015:11. Use comma to separate values

dataset_fields.label: Program Code
dataset_fields.help_text: Federal agencies, list the primary program related to this data asset, from the Federal Program Inventory. Use the format of 015:001. Use comma to separate values
License definitions and additional information can be found at http://opendefinition.org/
dataset_fields.label: License
Rights
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: eg. This dataset contains Personally Identifiable Information
dataset_fields.help_text: This may include information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies. This should also serve as an explanation for the selected “accessLevel” including instructions for how to access a restricted file, if applicable, or explanation for why a “non-public” or “restricted public” data asset is not “public,” if applicable. Text, 255 characters.

dataset_fields.label: Spatial
dataset_fields.help_text: The range of spatial applicability of a dataset. Could include a spatial region like a bounding box or a named place.

dataset_fields.label: Temporal
dataset_fields.help_text: The range of temporal applicability of a dataset (i.e., a start and end date of applicability for the data).

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.form_placeholder: Some useful notes about the data
